text: Alberto Testa (23 December 1922 â€“ 4 October 2019) was an Italian dancer, choreographer, dance critic and teacher. He was born in Turin. He choreographed many ballets of operatic music, and worked on movies mainly with Franco Zeffirelli and Luchino Visconti. Testa died in Turin on October 4, 2019 of pneumonia at the age of 96.Morto Alberto Testa, il 'prof' della Danza ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Dance critics Category:Italian dancers Category:Italian educators Category:Italian choreographers Category:People from Turin
title: Alberto Testa (dancer)
